ReferenceDocuments.description: Terminology codelist used with Yes No Unknown or Not Applicable Response within the Clinical Data Interchange Standards Consortium Study Data Tabulation Model.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form  Completion Instructions
ReferenceDocuments.description: Indicate if [specific clinical event] has occurred/is occurring by checking Yes or No.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CEOCCUR
ReferenceDocuments.description: Maps directly to the SDTMIG variable.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: The CDASH variable CEOCCUR is used to report the occurrence of a pre-specified clinical event not considered to be an adverse event by the sponsor. CEOCCUR should not be used for spontaneously reported events. The site should be able to indicate that the response was not asked or answered.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the participant report vomiting the dose?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the subject have the criteria for pre-immunotherapy treatment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient meet treatment failure criteria?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient experience treatment failure?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 6
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient have treatment failure?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CF Text 9
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have steroid refractory chronic GVHD as defined in the protocol?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 7
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is there an ongoing inflammatory process?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 10
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did patient develop acute graft versus host disease (GVHD) during this reporting period?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 11
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient have an infection during this course?
